mapper.select: select m.m_id,m.m_name,m.m_parentid,m.m_path,m.m_weight from users u INNER JOIN userroles ur INNER JOIN roles r INNER JOIN rolemodules rm INNER JOIN modules m on u.u_id=ur.ur_userid and r.r_id = rm.rm_roleid and m.m_id = rm.rm_moduleid and r.r_id = ur.ur_roleid u.u_loginname=#{u_loginname} and u.u_password=#{u_password} and u_islockout =0
